verses.verse: "Behold, <S%H2005><s%> My Servant, <S%H5650><s%> whom I uphold; <S%H8551><s%> My chosen <S%H972><s%> one [in whom] My soul <S%H5315><s%> delights. <S%H7521><s%> I have put <S%H5414><s%> My Spirit <S%H7307><s%> upon Him; He will bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> to the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
"He will not cry <S%H6817><s%> out or raise <S%H5375><s%> [His voice, <S%H6963><s%>] Nor <S%H3808><s%> make <S%H8085><s%> His voice heard <S%H8085><s%> in the street. <S%H2351><s%>

"A bruised <S%H7533><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> He will not break, <S%H7665><s%> And a dimly <S%H3544><s%> burning wick <S%H6594><s%> He will not extinguish; <S%H3518><s%> He will faithfully <S%H571><s%> bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> justice. <S%H4941><s%>

"He will not be disheartened <S%H3543><s%> or crushed, <S%H7533><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> He has established <S%H7760><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> in the earth; <S%H776><s%> And the coastlands <S%H339><s%> will wait <S%H3176><s%> expectantly <S%H3176><s%> for His law. <S%H8451><s%>"

Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> God <S%H410><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Who created <S%H1254><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and stretched <S%H5186><s%> them out, Who spread <S%H7554><s%> out the earth <S%H776><s%> and its offspring, <S%H6631><s%> Who gives <S%H5414><s%> breath <S%H5397><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> on it, And spirit <S%H7307><s%> to those who walk <S%H1980><s%> in it,

"I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> I have called <S%H7121><s%> you in righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> I will also hold <S%H2388><s%> you by the hand <S%H3027><s%> and watch <S%H5341><s%> over you, And I will appoint <S%H5414><s%> you as a covenant <S%H1285><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> As a light <S%H216><s%> to the nations, <S%H1471><s%>

To open <S%H6491><s%> blind <S%H5787><s%> eyes, <S%H5869><s%> To bring <S%H3318><s%> out prisoners <S%H616><s%> from the dungeon, <S%H4525><s%> And those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in darkness <S%H2822><s%> from the prison. <S%H1004><s%> <S%H3608><s%>

"I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> that is My name; <S%H8034><s%> I will not give <S%H5414><s%> My glory <S%H9202><s%> to another, <S%H312><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> My praise <S%H8416><s%> to graven <S%H6456><s%> images. <S%H6456><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the former <S%H7223><s%> things <S%H7223><s%> have come <S%H935><s%> to pass, <S%H935><s%> Now I declare <S%H5046><s%> new <S%H2319><s%> things; <S%H2319><s%> Before <S%H2962><s%> they spring <S%H6779><s%> forth <S%H6779><s%> I proclaim <S%H8085><s%> [them] to you."

Sing <S%H7891><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song, <S%H7892><s%> [Sing] His praise <S%H8416><s%> from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth! <S%H776><s%> You who go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and all <S%H4393><s%> that is in it. You islands <S%H339><s%> and those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> on them.

Let the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and its cities <S%H5892><s%> lift <S%H5375><s%> up [their voices,] The settlements <S%H9161><s%> where Kedar <S%H6938><s%> inhabits. <S%H3427><s%> Let the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Sela <S%H5553><s%> sing <S%H7442><s%> aloud, <S%H7442><s%> Let them shout <S%H6681><s%> for joy <S%H6681><s%> from the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>
Let them give <S%H7760><s%> glory <S%H9202><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And declare <S%H5046><s%> His praise <S%H8416><s%> in the coastlands. <S%H339><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> like a warrior, <S%H1368><s%> He will arouse <S%H5782><s%> [His] zeal <S%H7068><s%> like a man <S%H376><s%> of war. <S%H6873><s%> He will utter <S%H7321><s%> a shout, <S%H7321><s%> yes, <S%H637><s%> He will raise <S%H6873><s%> a war cry. <S%H6873><s%> He will prevail <S%H1396><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> His enemies. <S%H340><s%>

"I have kept <S%H2814><s%> silent <S%H2814><s%> for a long <S%H5769><s%> time, <S%H5769><s%> I have kept <S%H2790><s%> still <S%H2790><s%> and restrained <S%H662><s%> Myself. [Now] like a woman in labor <S%H3205><s%> I will groan, <S%H6463><s%> I will both <S%H3162><s%> gasp <S%H5395><s%> and pant. <S%H7602><s%>

"I will lay <S%H2717><s%> waste <S%H2717><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> and hills, <S%H1389><s%> And wither <S%H3001><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their vegetation; <S%H6212><s%> I will make <S%H7760><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> into coastlands, <S%H339><s%> And dry <S%H3001><s%> up the ponds. <S%H98><s%>

"And I will lead <S%H1980><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> by a way <S%H1870><s%> they do not know, <S%H3045><s%> In paths <S%H9350><s%> they do not know <S%H3045><s%> I will guide <S%H1869><s%> them. I will make <S%H7760><s%> darkness <S%H4285><s%> into light <S%H216><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them And rugged <S%H4625><s%> places <S%H4625><s%> into plains. <S%H4334><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the things <S%H1697><s%> I will do, <S%H6213><s%> And I will not leave <S%H5800><s%> them undone. <S%H5800><s%>"

They shall be turned <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H268><s%> and be utterly <S%H954><s%> put <S%H954><s%> to shame, <S%H954><s%> Who trust <S%H982><s%> in idols, <S%H6459><s%> Who say <S%H559><s%> to molten <S%H4541><s%> images, <S%H4541><s%> "You are our gods. <S%H430><s%>"
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> you deaf! <S%H2795><s%> And look, <S%H5027><s%> you blind, <S%H5787><s%> that you may see. <S%H7200><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is blind <S%H5787><s%> but My servant, <S%H5650><s%> Or so deaf <S%H2795><s%> as My messenger <S%H4397><s%> whom I send <S%H7971><s%>? Who <S%H4310><s%> is so blind <S%H5787><s%> as he that is at peace <S%H7999><s%> [with Me,] Or so blind <S%H5787><s%> as the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>?

You have seen <S%H7200><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> things, <S%H7227><s%> but you do not observe <S%H8104><s%> [them]; [Your] ears <S%H241><s%> are open, <S%H6491><s%> but none <S%H3808><s%> hears. <S%H8085><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> was pleased <S%H2654><s%> for His righteousness' sake <S%H4616><s%> To make <S%H1431><s%> the law <S%H8451><s%> great <S%H1431><s%> and glorious. <S%H142><s%>

But this <S%H1931><s%> is a people <S%H5971><s%> plundered <S%H962><s%> and despoiled; <S%H8154><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> of them are trapped <S%H6351><s%> in caves, <S%H2352><s%> Or are hidden <S%H2244><s%> away in prisons; <S%H3608><s%> They have become <S%H1961><s%> a prey <S%H957><s%> with none <S%H369><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> [them,] And a spoil, <S%H4933><s%> with none <S%H369><s%> to say, <S%H559><s%> "Give <S%H7725><s%> [them] back! <S%H7725><s%>"
Who <S%H4310><s%> among you will give <S%H238><s%> ear <S%H238><s%> to this <S%H384><s%>? Who will give <S%H7181><s%> heed <S%H7181><s%> and listen <S%H8085><s%> hereafter <S%H268><s%>?

Who <S%H4310><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> up for spoil, <S%H4933><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> to plunderers <S%H962><s%>? Was it not the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> against whom <S%H2098><s%> we have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> And in whose ways <S%H1870><s%> they were not willing <S%H14><s%> to walk, <S%H1980><s%> And whose law <S%H8451><s%> they did not obey <S%H8085><s%>?

So He poured <S%H8210><s%> out on him the heat <S%H2534><s%> of His anger <S%H639><s%> And the fierceness <S%H5807><s%> of battle; <S%H4421><s%> And it set <S%H3857><s%> him aflame <S%H3857><s%> all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> around, <S%H5439><s%> Yet he did not recognize <S%H3045><s%> [it;] And it burned <S%H1197><s%> him, but he paid <S%H7760><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> attention. <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3820><s%>
